item.description:
Our traditional monthly event has a great relaxed format and location!  Join fellow Beanstalks for an economical evening featuring good conversation, variety of food and an excellent movie.

Bring a dish to share, then after we eat we’ll watch a DVD on Jan & Susan’s big screen TV.  Multiple current and classic DVDs will be available (feel free to bring one along if you like).  Whatever the group can agree on is what we’ll watch.
item.name: Dinner & a Movie Night
